doc.previous: At the Earth s surface earthquakes manifest themselves by shaking and sometimes displacement of the ground When the epicenter of a large earthquake is located offshore the seabed sometimes is uplifted enough to cause a tsunami The shaking in earthquakes can also trigger landslides and occasionally volcanic activity read more
doc.after: Seismology from the Greek seismos earthquake and logos knowledge is the scientific study of earthquakes and the propagation of elastic waves through the Earth The field also includes studies of earthquake effects such as tsunamis as well as diverse seismic sources such as volcanic tectonic and artificial processes explosions A related field that uses geology to infer information regarding past earthquakes is paleoseismology
